title: Fix an error in the training task for the needsdiagnosis model
body:
The following error is caused by the missing body of a github issue: 
https://api.github.com/repos/webcompat/web-bugs/issues/82617

```
Traceback (most recent call last):
  File "/usr/local/bin/bugbug-train", line 8, in <module>
    sys.exit(main())
  File "/usr/local/lib/python3.9/site-packages/scripts/trainer.py", line 157, in main
    retriever.go(args)
  File "/usr/local/lib/python3.9/site-packages/scripts/trainer.py", line 51, in go
    metrics = model_obj.train(limit=args.limit)
  File "/usr/local/lib/python3.9/site-packages/bugbug/model.py", line 348, in train
    X = self.extraction_pipeline.fit_transform(X_gen)
  File "/usr/local/lib/python3.9/site-packages/sklearn/pipeline.py", line 378, in fit_transform
    Xt = self._fit(X, y, **fit_params_steps)
  File "/usr/local/lib/python3.9/site-packages/sklearn/pipeline.py", line 303, in _fit
    X, fitted_transformer = fit_transform_one_cached(
  File "/usr/local/lib/python3.9/site-packages/joblib/memory.py", line 352, in __call__
    return self.func(*args, **kwargs)
  File "/usr/local/lib/python3.9/site-packages/sklearn/pipeline.py", line 754, in _fit_transform_one
    res = transformer.fit_transform(X, y, **fit_params)
  File "/usr/local/lib/python3.9/site-packages/sklearn/base.py", line 699, in fit_transform
    return self.fit(X, **fit_params).transform(X)
  File "/usr/local/lib/python3.9/site-packages/bugbug/issue_features.py", line 80, in transform
    body = cleanup_function(body)
  File "/usr/local/lib/python3.9/site-packages/bugbug/feature_cleanup.py", line 29, in __call__
    return self.pattern.sub("__FILE_REFERENCE__", text)
TypeError: expected string or bytes-like object
```
